Ann Curry Reports NBC NewsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Ann Curry looks into whether a link exists between recent extreme weather events and climate change. In the special documentary, Curry travels to the Arctic, to drought stricken regions in the American West, to the edge of rising seas in Florida, and into extreme weather events all over the globe, meeting with both scientists and eyewitnesses.
